name: Feed Your Dog
description:
Feed Your Dog is a dice game I made for GDevelop Game Jam #2. The goal of the game is to go around the board and collect gems which you need to feed your dog. When you have enough gems, just click on the object in cloud and your next task will appear. After you complete all the tasks your dog gave to you, congratulations, you completed the game :)

https://liluo.io/igorthegamedeveloper/feedyourdog
